Films with the cast

(Pause) I am Hansung, show a lot of love...next, show a lot of love, to look cooler, I will try harder, what am I saying, this is still hard (since promoting dramas is new to him, he has a hard time coming up with words) because we worked hard, please watch us! Thank you, bye. Bye!"

Press Conference 

9:28 "I am going (on my way and will be back to and from the conference) to the conference. It's my first conference so I'm extremely nervous but without showing nervousness, I will be a pro, because I'm BTS's V, I will show you! Thank you!"

Asks for a bright smile, asks to do a flower pose (the reporter says she asks him to do the flower pose bc he's the maknae (youngest) of the group and wants to find out the type of character he portrays in the drama, seeing as he's the first one to act out of BTS)

10:15 "Hello, playing the Hansung character in Hwarang, this is (I am) Kim Taehyung. Hansung is pure, bright, curious, and if he gets distracted (falls into something), he will focus on that one thing. I feel that we are alike in this way a bit. There's also a bit of sadness behind his character, so pay attention to his character and be comfortable/comfortably watch him. And, I have a group chat with my members, and when I'm filming, whether it's in the middle of the night, afternoon, or early in the morning, through KakaoTalk, ah, they'll send a message "are you doing well", "work hard" or "let's hwaiting." They send me a lot of cheering on/supporting messages."

11:28 "On a summer day, we were filming in a room but the room was faced with light so the room was hot. We were all supposed to fight (fight scene) and during action, everyone was hot, sweating a lot, but we can't be showing sweat while filming, so we changed and carried mini fans and we had that type of episode" (meaning this happened).
